$ul: **boot_count**: Is increased with 1 when the service starts. Is never cleared (unless the database is adjusted).
**config**: JSON object with possible settings. Refer to individual service documentation for a good overview.
**config_request**: Object containing the new configuration. This will be applied automatically when the values are valid.
**name**: Human readable name for the resource.
**restart_request**: Set this to `true` to send a reset request for the specific resource.
**time_created**: [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) formatted string for when this resource was created.
**time_updated**: [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) formatted string for when this resource was updated.
**version**: Current running version of the resource.
